body.p:
Blandville Ky Apl 8" 1861
To his Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Respected
Sir

On the 15" Day of November 1859 you issued a requisition for the State of Mississippi to Thos H Richarson to take and bring back to this state W. B. Hyde who is indicted in this county for felony, Richardson went to Mississippi in obedience to your requisition but Hyde had left there, We have found out that he is now in the State of Tennessee and as he is continually traveling from one place to another, It is desired that you should issue another requisition directed ^to^ Thos H Richardson for the State of Tennessee -- your earliest attention to this matter will much

oblige your friend
Thos H. Corbett

To his Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Frankfort
Ky
P. S. Direct to requisition to Thos H Richardson, Blandville Ky
